name: firemni-asistent
description: Comprehensive business management system with microservices architecture

scripts.dev: docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml up -d && npm run dev:services
scripts.dev:services: concurrently "npm run dev:user-service" "npm run dev:customer-service" "npm run dev:order-service" "npm run dev:inventory-service" "npm run dev:billing-service" "npm run dev:notification-service" "npm run dev:gateway"
scripts.logs:performance: docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml logs | grep duration | sort -k4 -nr | head -20
scripts.db:migrate: npm run db:migrate:user && npm run db:migrate:customer && npm run db:migrate:order && npm run db:migrate:inventory && npm run db:migrate:billing && npm run db:migrate:notification
scripts.db:migrate:user: cd services/user-service && npx prisma migrate deploy
scripts.db:migrate:customer: cd services/customer-service && npx prisma migrate deploy
scripts.db:migrate:order: cd services/order-service && npx prisma migrate deploy
scripts.db:migrate:inventory: cd services/inventory-service && npx prisma migrate deploy
scripts.db:migrate:billing: cd services/billing-service && npx prisma migrate deploy
scripts.db:migrate:notification: cd services/notification-service && npx prisma migrate deploy
scripts.db:generate: npm run db:generate:user && npm run db:generate:customer && npm run db:generate:order && npm run db:generate:inventory && npm run db:generate:billing && npm run db:generate:notification
scripts.db:seed: npm run db:seed:user && npm run db:seed:customer && npm run db:seed:order && npm run db:seed:inventory
scripts.db:reset: docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml down -v && docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml up -d postgres && sleep 10 && npm run db:migrate && npm run db:seed
scripts.db:studio: concurrently "cd services/user-service && npx prisma studio --port 5001" "cd services/order-service && npx prisma studio --port 5002" "cd services/billing-service && npx prisma studio --port 5003"
scripts.test: npm run test:unit && npm run test:integration
scripts.test:unit: npm run test:unit:services && npm run test:unit:gateway
scripts.test:integration: npm run test:integration:services && npm run test:integration:e2e
scripts.test:unit:services: concurrently "cd services/user-service && npm test" "cd services/customer-service && npm test" "cd services/order-service && npm test" "cd services/inventory-service && npm test" "cd services/billing-service && npm test" "cd services/notification-service && npm test"
scripts.test:integration:services: concurrently "cd services/user-service && npm run test:integration" "cd services/order-service && npm run test:integration" "cd services/billing-service && npm run test:integration"
scripts.test:coverage: npm run test:coverage:services && npm run test:coverage:gateway
scripts.test:coverage:services: concurrently "cd services/user-service && npm run test:coverage" "cd services/order-service && npm run test:coverage" "cd services/billing-service && npm run test:coverage"
scripts.build: npm run build:services && npm run build:gateway
scripts.build:services: concurrently "cd services/user-service && npm run build" "cd services/customer-service && npm run build" "cd services/order-service && npm run build" "cd services/inventory-service && npm run build" "cd services/billing-service && npm run build" "cd services/notification-service && npm run build"
scripts.build:docker: npm run build:docker:services && npm run build:docker:gateway
scripts.build:docker:services: concurrently "docker build -t gcr.io/firemni-asistent/user-service ./services/user-service" "docker build -t gcr.io/firemni-asistent/customer-service ./services/customer-service" "docker build -t gcr.io/firemni-asistent/order-service ./services/order-service" "docker build -t gcr.io/firemni-asistent/inventory-service ./services/inventory-service" "docker build -t gcr.io/firemni-asistent/billing-service ./services/billing-service" "docker build -t gcr.io/firemni-asistent/notification-service ./services/notification-service"
scripts.lint: npm run lint:services && npm run lint:gateway
scripts.lint:services: concurrently "cd services/user-service && npm run lint" "cd services/customer-service && npm run lint" "cd services/order-service && npm run lint" "cd services/inventory-service && npm run lint" "cd services/billing-service && npm run lint" "cd services/notification-service && npm run lint"
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:fix:services && npm run lint:fix:gateway
scripts.lint:fix:services: concurrently "cd services/user-service && npm run lint:fix" "cd services/customer-service && npm run lint:fix" "cd services/order-service && npm run lint:fix" "cd services/inventory-service && npm run lint:fix" "cd services/billing-service && npm run lint:fix" "cd services/notification-service && npm run lint:fix"
scripts.type-check: npm run type-check:services && npm run type-check:gateway
scripts.type-check:services: concurrently "cd services/user-service && npm run type-check" "cd services/customer-service && npm run type-check" "cd services/order-service && npm run type-check" "cd services/inventory-service && npm run type-check" "cd services/billing-service && npm run type-check" "cd services/notification-service && npm run type-check"
scripts.quality:check: npm run lint && npm run type-check && npm run format:check && npm run test:unit
scripts.clean: npm run clean:services && npm run clean:gateway && npm run clean:deps
scripts.clean:services: concurrently "cd services/user-service && rm -rf dist node_modules" "cd services/customer-service && rm -rf dist node_modules" "cd services/order-service && rm -rf dist node_modules" "cd services/inventory-service && rm -rf dist node_modules" "cd services/billing-service && rm -rf dist node_modules" "cd services/notification-service && rm -rf dist node_modules"
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:services && npm run install:gateway
scripts.install:services: concurrently "cd services/user-service && npm install" "cd services/customer-service && npm install" "cd services/order-service && npm install" "cd services/inventory-service && npm install" "cd services/billing-service && npm install" "cd services/notification-service && npm install"
scripts.security:audit: npm run security:audit:services && npm run security:audit:gateway
scripts.security:audit:services: concurrently "cd services/user-service && npm audit" "cd services/customer-service && npm audit" "cd services/order-service && npm audit" "cd services/inventory-service && npm audit" "cd services/billing-service && npm audit" "cd services/notification-service && npm audit"
scripts.security:deps: cd security && npm run deps:npm-audit && cd security && npm run deps:snyk

author: Firemn√≠ Asistent Team
